remarks: If a property is true for some ordinal number, it is true for a minimal ordinal number.  This version uses implicit substitution.  Theorem Schema 62 of [Suppes] p. 228.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Oct-2003.)
statement:
onminsb.1 $e |- F/ x ps $.
onminsb.2 $e |- ( x = |^| { x e. On | ph } -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
onminsb $p |- ( E. x e. On ph -> ps ) $.
